triples.name: Collision avoidance
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel optimization-based method for solving collision avoidance problems.

triples.name: Convex optimization
triples.relevance: The paper uses strong duality of convex optimization to reformulate collision constraints.

triples.name: Trajectory optimization
triples.relevance: The paper applies its method to trajectory planning tasks for collision-free motion.

triples.name: Gradient descent
triples.relevance: The paper enables the use of gradient-based optimization algorithms for collision avoidance.

triples.name: Signed distance function
triples.relevance: The paper connects its results with signed distance, widely used in traditional trajectory generation algorithms.

triples.name: Hessian matrix
triples.relevance: The paper enables the use of Hessian-based optimization algorithms for solving the reformulated collision constraints.
